description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+31 vs AC; 2d10+9 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+31 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Ranged 20

Trigger: When an enemy attacks the dragon with a ranged attack, at-will

Targets the triggering enemy; +28 vs Reflex; 1d10+7 damage, and the target is blinded until the end of the dragon's next turn.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Close blast 10

+28 vs Fortitude; 4d10+7 damage. The blast creates an area of swirling sand that remains in place until the end of the dragon's next turn. Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the area or that moves through the area takes 10 damage. The area blocks line of sight for all creatures except the dragon.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +28 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Encounter

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 5

+28 vs Fortitude; the target slides 3 squares and is slowed until the end of the dragon's next turn.

Encounter

Standard

+29 vs Fortitude; 3d8+7 damage, and the target slides 5 squares. This power creates an area of swirling sand that remains in place until the end of the dragon's next turn. The area blocks line of sight for all creatures except the dragon.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Polymorph

Move

The brown dragon transforms into a cloud of sand and shifts a number of squares up to its speed. It can move through occupied squares but must end in a legal space. Any creature whose space the dragon enters takes 3d6 + 7 damage and is blinded (save ends). The dragon returns to its normal form at the end of this move.
The brown dragon deals 4d6 extra damage against any target it has combat advantage against.
